title: Remember
description: We are what our hearts have adopted. Wednesday Marilyn's heart has adopted coldness, and her impending betrothal does little to warm it. An aristocrat raised in a gothic home, between a neglectful mother, and an eccentric father, she's long stopped looking for the light at the end of the tunnel. Just when it seems like there is no hope, she meets Zach. He changes everything. Unfortunately for her, she's forgotten something very important.So important, it threatens to extinguish her new found light for good.
author: Rin Haven
